title: One of my friend just can't Get Emails From Riot anymore.
body: We have been check the junk mail before but we found nothing, it is really weird because we can saw the mail sent by riot long time ago  when he create his account. We  just clicked "Forgot Password" and looked at his e-mail several times but there is nothing. Can somebody help us please?{{summoner:4}}

replies.body: I've snipped out the email in your postl for privacy.  It's possible that the email registered to the account may be different.  Wolfess has a solid tip here to determine the registered email.  Have your friend reach out to our account team through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  We'll help with updating information!

here on boards, check the top right menu where your summoner name appears, then click settings.
in the new page make sure that the partial email address showing matches the one you used to register your account, or at least the one that you currently remember having associated with your account.

if it does not match, your account may be compromised and I would strongly suggest you submit a support ticket.
If you have any idea please tell me! Here's my e-mail address: --snip--
